boardgame.name: Small City
boardgame.description: You are the mayor of one borough of Small City, and you have eight turns to secure enough votes to be re-elected. To do this, you have to attract more citizens, encourage the growth of residential areas for them to live in, and aid the expansion of both the commercial and industrial sectors _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; though the latter sector also brings pollution with it, and you need to deal with that, too, as high pollution levels will have a negative effect on your score at the end of the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;If you build suitable infrastructure, your citizens will undoubtedly vote for your re-election, but beware of false promises! Votes can be earned over the course of the game by placing citizens in the residential spaces, by erecting cultural buildings, by keeping commercial buildings in suitable areas, and also by making good on the promises that you made to the citizens at the beginning of the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The player with the most votes (i.e., victory points) after eight turns wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Heavy Cardboard Episode 52 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Amanda_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s Top 50 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Edward_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s Top 50

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: I am the designer who is selling one part of the small print run on BGG to thank the web site and all the geek community. The box is brand new, ready to be signed if you wish, with punched boards shrink-wrapped so they will arrive safe and the tiles won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t be lost in the box. Thank you for your support Shipping costs to France : 5€ Europe : 10€ Rest of the world : 15€ I can combine Small City with Card City for 5€ more, two games of the trilogy and I invite you to discover the great new editions of Town Center from Ludicreations, the second game of the trilogy...

Kickstarter

Brand new. This is not a pre-order! Brought this copy over myself acquired from Alban Viard personally. Ready to ship as soon as payment is received. Buyer pays actual shipping, priority or cheapest, whichever is preferred. International buyers cover insurance (usually only $2-3 extra) to protect us both in the event of loss or damage. Also happy to combine shipping with any other games I have listed for sale/trade. Marketplace Listings: https://boardgamegeek.com/geekmarket/user/NuMystic For Trade List: https://boardgamegeek.com/collection/user/NuMystic?rankobjecttype=subtype_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rankobjectid=1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;columns=title%7Cstatus%7Cversion%7Crank%7Cavgrating%7Cconditiontext_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;geekranks=%0A%09%09%09%09%09%09%09%09%09Board+Game+Rank%0A%09%09%09%09%09%09%09%09_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;trade=1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ff=1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;subtype=boardgame Will accept PayPal, money orders, Amazon/OLGS gift cards, cashiers or personal checks but buyer will need to cover any associated fees other than the 3% going to BGG. Feel free to peruse my 100% positive trade and marketplace feedback to get a feel for how much I pride I take in making sure every person I deal with is absolutely thrilled with what they get. Marketplace Feedback: https://boardgamegeek.com/geekmarket/user/NuMystic/feedback Trade Feedback: https://boardgamegeek.com/trade/feedback/451998 If you have any questions, don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t hesitate to ask! Kind Regards, Dante
The game is new, but not in shrink, as Alban Viard sold this game without any shrink in Essen 2015. But still all punchboard has to be punched etc. Including Kickstarter Stretch Goals
Kickstarter édition Multilangue -Character Meeple Expansion 1 – The Political Activist -Small City: Player boards Expansion #1 – The Beach
Any questions please ask. non-smoker

Opened, but unplayed. Feel free to message me if you have any questions. Shipping: Please ask for the details! Shipping depends on destination and total weight. (Germany 5,99€ DHL, most other EU countries 16€). I will accept payment via Paypal (if you pay the fees / or send money to friends) or Bank Transfer.

New in shrink. Local pick-up available in Kew Gardens, Queens NY. You pay only the actual shipping, priority or cheapest, whichever is preferred with no extra packing or handling fees. I have online accounts with FedEx, UPS, and USPS and pass on those discounts to you. (as much as 10-20% off what you’d pay at the counter) International orders require insurance which is usually only $2-3 extra to protect us both in the event of loss or damage. Also happy to combine shipping with any other games I have listed for sale/trade. Marketplace Listings: https://boardgamegeek.com/geekmarket/user/NuMystic For Trade List: https://boardgamegeek.com/collection/user/NuMystic?rankobjecttype=subtype_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rankobjectid=1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;columns=title%7Cstatus%7Cversion%7Crank%7Cavgrating%7Cconditiontext_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;geekranks=%0A%09%09%09%09%09%09%09%09%09Board+Game+Rank%0A%09%09%09%09%09%09%09%09_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;trade=1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ff=1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;subtype=boardgame Happy to accept PayPal, money orders, Amazon/OLGS gift cards, cashiers or personal checks but you will need to cover any associated fees, if any, other than the 3% going to BGG. I’m a very active gamer, forum contributor, trader, and marketplace buyer myself! Feel free to peruse my 100% positive trade and marketplace feedback to get a feel for how much I pride I take in making sure every person I deal with is absolutely thrilled with what they receive. Marketplace Feedback: https://boardgamegeek.com/geekmarket/user/NuMystic/feedback Trade Feedback: https://boardgamegeek.com/trade/feedback/451998 If you have any questions, don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t hesitate to ask! Kind Regards, Dante

Any other destination country will also get very special shipping prices, almost free, ask for details !!

This listing is for the retail base game and the first 6 expansions: The Beach The Political Activist Big Tiles The Forests The Rivers The Godzillas All items are new, unpunched, and in original packaging. Please note that the box for this game was never shrink-wrapped by the publisher. The retail base game does not include the numbered and signed graphic, but is otherwise identical to the KS version. Send your zip code for a shipping estimate. Pick up in the DC Metro area is an option.
Perfect condition never played.
